sentences: Eniola Akinbo (born December 9, 1985), known professionally as Niyola, is a Nigerian singer and songwriter.
Eniola Akinbo was born in Lagos, on December 9, 1985.
Niyola emerged runner up in the Amen Starlet competition in 2000.
She began her professional music career in 2005 and was briefly affiliated with eLDeeâ€™s Trybe Records.
On May 22, 2013, she released the single "Toh Bad", her first release under the label.
